name: CanWIN
description: CanWIN (Canadian Watershed Information Network) is the data centre for the Centre for Earth Observation Science (CEOS). It supports research, education, and informs management, policy, and evidence-based decision-making across Canadian watersheds, including the Arctic.
owner_name: University of Manitoba, Centre for Earth Observation Science (CEOS)

geotopics.description: Inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics. Examples: rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods, water quality, hydrographic charts.
